short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension with two separate timers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Every 71 minutes, a pedestrian is killed by a vehicle and every 9 minutes one is injured.

This is an extension that displays two timers, one for each event. When they reach zero, a symbolic pedestrian is killed or injured.
